Body:
try:
    os.makedirs('_temp')
except:
    pass
subprocess.check_output(['MJOLNIRCalibrationInspector', '-s _temp/', '-b 1',
    dataFiles[0]])
filesCreated = ['_temp/Final_Energy_Individual_1.png',
    '_temp/Final_Energy_Overview_1.png',
    '_temp/Instrument_calibration_1.png', '_temp/Normalization_1.png']
for file in filesCreated:
    assert os.path.exists(file)
    os.remove(file)
os.rmdir('_temp')
pytest.mark.skip(reason='Fails on the headless Travis-ci')
